alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 7:47PM CDT until April 21 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting George, Greene and Jackson Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...Until late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Flood Stage. Water approaches homes in west Merrill. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 22.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue to fall through late week, falling below flood stage late Thursday night. It is forecast to then continue falling to a stage of 10.8 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
